name: serializeXML
description: Serializes the given object to XML.

params.name: useCustomSerializer
params.description: Whether to use the custom serializer. The default value is true. The custom serializer will be always used for XML deserialization. If false, the XML/JSON deserialization will be done using the default ColdFusion behavior. If any other type is passed with useCustomSerializer as false, then TypeNotSupportedException will be thrown.

examples.title: Serialize a struct to XML (Script syntax)
examples.description: This will serialize the object to XML using ColdFusion's default serialization mechanism.
